title: ADF Deployment Overview
description: Azure Data Factory (ADF), the cloud-based data integration service for Microsoft Azure, is a common target for BimlFlex data solutions. In this section we will discuss items that pertain to ADF deployment.

frontMatter.title: ADF Deployment Overview
frontMatter.summary: Guidance in Azure Data Factory concurrent development, CI/CD delivery, sensitive information management, and deployment through PowerShell and Azure portal
